messages.title: My vision for a prosperous Britain
messages.content: I have a vision that Britain’s products and exports will once again be the best in the world, creating demand for our products. This will bring investment in this country and the most growth, helping our country to be one of the major powerhouses.

messages.title: Winter Warmer
messages.content: “I am delighted with my winter payments thanks to our Labour Government. This year I have had three cold weather payments of £25 each, as well as my £400 winter heating allowance.” - Ivy Gigge, Local Resident

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Promote community services to provide health services integrated with health to encourage a caring society.
Create a real alternative to the car giving a route out roads from congestion.
Helping people to buy quality property at a reasonable price, especially our young people.
Reducing violent crime and antisocial behaviour, making police forces more accountable to the local community.
Achieve a greener environment for future generations.

issues.economy: The government's action on the economy is now bearing fruit. Despite criticism from opposition parties the Labour Government has made the right decisions to ease the downturn.
issues.education: When we came to power in 1997 we made great promises on education as one of our primary goals for improvement. Many new schools have been built since 1997, and at least one in Rushcliffe this includes East Leake (primary and secondary), Gotham, Cotgrave, and Pierrepont Gamston.
issues.health: Since 1997 waiting list are down by 600,000, we have a maximum of 18 weeks referral to treatment. Over 89,000 more Nurses and over 44,000 more Doctors. We will continue to work to improve the NHS.

housing.content: Helping people to buy quality property at a reasonable price, especially our young people.

politicalExperience.role: THE LABOUR CANDIDATE FOR NOTTINGHAM NORTH CONSTITUENCY
politicalExperience.achievements: Have shown how the Conservatives have undermined the area and built up timely policies through real town forums and inspired changes, sitting people round the kitchen tables and listening to their ideas. These have inspired the ideas behind many of their successful election manifesto.

endorsements.endorsement: “I am delighted with my winter payments thanks to our Labour Government. This year I have had three cold weather payments of £25 each, as well as my £400 winter heating allowance.”

images.caption: ANDREW CLAYWORTH at a local market
